original_text: I pray this for the tribe of Gad: Praise the Lord, who will give more land to Gad's people! Gad lives there like a hungry lion. He will tear off the arm or the head of his enemies. I pray this for the tribe of Gad:
korean_text: 갓에 대하여는 일렀으되 갓을 광대하게 하시는 이에게 찬송을 부를지어다 갓이 암사자 같이 엎드리고 팔과 정수리를 찢는도다

sentences.original_text: I pray this for the tribe of Gad:
sentences.korean_translation: 나는 갓 지파를 위해 이렇게 기도합니다:

sentences.original_text: who will give more land to Gad's people!
sentences.korean_translation: 그분은 갓 백성에게 더 많은 땅을 주실 것입니다!

sentences.original_text: Gad lives there like a hungry lion.
He will tear off the arm or the head
